message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I'm really interested, but $110 is a bit more than I'm looking to spend right now. How about $105?
I understand that $105 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we compromise at $108?
